Starscream

Starscream walked into Destructor's base, looking around.

"So, this is where we'll be staying for a bit. Cool, but I really 
want to get my hands on Megatron." He walked over to KitKat. "Let me 
and Drillbit go on a mission and bring Inferno back here. I'm sure he 
knows the real wherabouts of that virus. I can make him talk." He 
smiled evily.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

They started walking back to the Ark with everyone, hoping they could 
forget about the Trainers and install the things they worked so hard 
to get.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois saw Battera try to lose him in the caverns. Not so fast, Bat-
girl. The Crimson Scavenger wants to have a few words with you. He 
follows her with some dificulty, clipping his wing on that sharp 
turn. He loses control of a second, but balanes himself and attempts 
to catch up. He sees her enter a cave, but when he goes in he can't 
see her any where. He cries out.

"Yo, Bat-Girl! Listen, I'm sorry about earlier. I was angry because I 
don't like sarcasm. By what I know, I think you're in the same 
position as me. Only I think you have some idea of where you came 
from before you joined the Alliance. I had....a flashback, I guess 
you could call it. It had you in it, and you were crying, and I was 
happy for you, and I don't UNDERSTAND IT!" Vulois sat down, 
frustrated, "I'm sorry, it's just, I think you may know something, 
and I really want to clear this up. So, before all of this, did I 
know you somewhere? Doing something?" He prayed she had the answer.
